All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Balance
    Creates the balance and contains methods to update the balance after each game of Baccarat
    Bet
    Enum containing the Bet options in a game of Baccarat
    Card
    Creates a Card Object containing Rank and Suit
    Controller
    Receives and validates user input, and run game using methods in Game, and updates View.
    Game
    Calculates outcome of a game of Baccarat when given a bet and wager.
    Game.Result  
    Hand
    Creates the hands that will be used to hold dealt cards.
    IllegalBetException
    Exception that extends IllegalArgumentException to handle invalid bets.
    IllegalWagerAmountException
    Exception that extends IllegalArgumentException to handle invalid wagers.
    Main
    Creates game, Game view, View controller Controller and take care of overall game flows
    NoBalanceException
    Exception that extends IllegalArgumentException to handle balance.
    Rank
    Contains the card ranks and the associated Baccarat point value
    Shoe
    Creates a shoe that holds n amount of decks
    Suit
    Creates the card suits and associated symbol and color.
    Suit.Color  
    View
    Creates the representation of the information to display to the user.
